name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant v. Michael Ryan BUDKA, Appellee

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant v. Michael Ryan BUDKA, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been IMPROVIDENTLY GRANTED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Thomas L. Kearney, III, Esq., Stephanie Elizabeth Lom-bardo, Esq., York County District Attorney’s Office, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
John Morgan Hamme, Esq., for Michael Ryan Budka.
casebody.head_matter:
111 A.3d 746
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant v. Michael Ryan BUDKA, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Dec. 5, 2014.
Decided March 25, 2015.
Thomas L. Kearney, III, Esq., Stephanie Elizabeth Lom-bardo, Esq., York County District Attorney’s Office, for Commonwealth of Pennsylvania.
John Morgan Hamme, Esq., for Michael Ryan Budka.
